scripts.postbuild: node -e "console.log('âœ… build complete - listing dist:'); const f=require('fs'); const p='dist'; try{const walk=(d,pre='')=>{f.readdirSync(d).forEach(fn=>{const fp=require('path').join(d,fn); if(f.statSync(fp).isDirectory()) walk(fp,pre+fn+'/'); else console.log(pre+fn)});} ; if(f.existsSync(p)) walk(p); }catch(e){console.error(e)}"
